title: Hearing procedure
context: [ยง634J-3] Hearing procedure. At the hearing upon the motion for security the court shall consider material evidence, written or oral, by witnesses or affidavit. No determination made by the court in determining or ruling upon the motion shall be, or be deemed to be, a determination of any issue in the litigation or of the merits of the litigation. [L 1993, c 124, pt of ยง1]
